title: Fort Raleigh National Historic Site: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips                Field Trips         Fort Raleigh ranger with Junior Rangers National Park Service   Bringing your class to Fort Raleigh National Historic Site can be a rewarding experience. School groups may attend one of our ranger-led programs. You may also plan a self-guided tour. For scheduling ranger programs, please contact the visitor center at (252) 473-2111 ext. 9001 Monday through Saturday between 10:30 am and 6:30 pm and Sundays 9 am to 5 pm.
